participant_1.background:

i work as a vet.
i am a vet tech.
i can read in english and french.

participant_2.background:
I spent a few hours yesterday planning my next garden project.
i work part time in the campus library.

I treasure my ability to swim.

content.text: I am doing well! How about you?
I am doing well too! I am a vet tech, and I am afraid of failing to reach my full potential.
I used to be a meat eater but I am now a vegan. I am taking advantage of my newfound freedom to travel and see the world.
That is so cool! I can read in English and French. I am also taking advantage of my newfound freedom to travel and see the world. I am going to be visiting Toronto soon!
Oh that is so exciting! I am so glad you are going to be visiting Toronto! I am looking forward to meeting you!
Thank you! I am looking forward to meeting you too!
What is your favorite thing about being a vet tech?
My favorite thing about being a vet tech is being able to help animals and make a difference in their lives.
That is so great! I am sure you are a great vet tech!
Thank you! I am a big fan of your garden project! I love gardening as well!
Thank you! I am so glad you like it! I am excited to see how it turns out!
I am sure it will turn out great!
Thank you! I hope you have a wonderful time in Toronto!
Thank you! I am sure I will!
